resources.string: Do you want to reset all scores?

Scoreboard is a simple score board. You can track team scores and configure team count and names.

Scoring

Touch a team column and a score dialog will pop up. The selected score will get added to the column you\'ve touched and will be summed automatically.

If you add a wrong score use the undo menu. It will revert the last added score.

When you finish a game use the reset menu option to start a new one.

Team names and count

To change a team name - hold on the team name. The number of teams can be configured in the settings menu.
